title: Is this a picture of the KKK gathering in Mississippi?
subtitle: With increased protests after the death of a black man in police custody in May 2020, it is alleged that a viral image shows that members of the Ku Klux Klan group gathered in Mississippi.
author: Nur Ibrahim
vclaim: The picture shows a number of numbers in the white hoods - supposedly from Ko Klux Klan, a white sovereign group - at a gathering in May 2020 in Mississippi.
